Name: Hot And Lovely 3
About the game: This is a very interesting leisure origami game, which can exercise your hands-on ability~ In the game, you must fold the paper into the specified cute figure as much as possible in the specified origami level The game is challenging from simple to difficult New 80 levels waiting for your challenge~ Game features 80 different levels waiting for your challenge Each character has multiple interactions waiting for your discovery Interesting origami, time to show your wisdom New simple play and help mode More difficult mode waiting for your challenge
